APP_CENTER_API_INTEGRATION_CLIENTID.description: Marketing Cloud App Center Authentication and Integration Client ID.

APP_CENTER_API_INTEGRATION_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Marketing Cloud App Center Authentication and Integration Client Secret.

PUSH_REGISTRATION_DE_NAME.description: DE Name of Marketing Cloud Data Extension used to store web push registrations

PUSH_REGISTRATION_DE_EXTERNAL_KEY.description: DE External Key of Marketing Cloud Data Extension used to store web push registrations

GCM_SENDER_ID.description: Google Cloud Messaging Sender ID.  Can be found https://console.firebase.google.com in YourProject->Settings->CLOUD MESSAGING

GCM_SERVER_KEY.description: Google Cloud Messaging Server Key.  Can be found https://console.firebase.google.com in YourProject->Settings->CLOUD MESSAGING
